description: This file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing endpoints for greeting, documentation redirection, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for greeting, documentation, health, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI for API documentation, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns 'OK' indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
